title: BBC Local Live: Essex Wednesday, 25 November 2015 - BBC News
summary: lorry fire closes a12 in both directions at junction 17 , near howe green .
the family of gordon wilson , who has been missing for a month , write a letter urging him to come home .
news , sport , weather and travel updates resume at 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: our live coverage has finished for today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back tomorrow morning , bringing you the very latest news , sport , weather and travel updates for essex from 08:00 .
have a good evening - and if you 're caught up on the a12 , we hope you get home soon !

documents.title: a12 lorry fire was 'massive explosion '
text: braintree taxi driver , robert smith , witnessed the moment a lorry `` exploded '' on the a12 at howe green earlier this morning .
author: Gareth George
BBC Look East

documents.title: having a bad day ? this man spent seven hours travelling from wickford to chelmsford
text: if you think you 're having a bad day , spare a thought for peter holliman , who spent around seven hours travelling from wickford to chelmsford .
mr holliman left shotgate for our studios at 07:45 , but became stuck on the gridlocked a130 when a lorry caught fire on the a12 .
`` i could have travelled to america the time it took me to get here '' , he said .
the 13 mile ( 20.9km ) journey usually takes around 25 minutes .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : turning chilly under clear skies
text: it will turn chilly under clear skies again this evening .
however , overnight cloud will thicken to bring a few spells of light rain or drizzle by morning .
minimum temperature : 3c ( 37f ) .
tomorrow morning will occasionally be bright , but once again cloud will increase to bring a dull end to the day .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : northbound a12 remains closed and colchester pensioner stabbing appeal
text: here are your top stories for essex :
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: dinner treat for officer who dealt with a12 lorry fire
text: looks as if sgt colin shead will be enjoying a well-earned meal tonight .
he has spent most of his day dealing with the a12 lorry fire .
steak & ale pie with roasties tonight .
who 's a lucky .
makes it all worth while .

documents.title: a12 diversion causing long tailbacks
text: motorists are being advised to avoid the a12 at howe green , but as you can see there 's congestion as far as the eye can see .
a diversion is in place via the exit slip road to the howe green roundabout , and then back up the entry slip road to rejoin the a12 , but traffic is moving very slowly .

documents.title: a12 northbound resurfacing under way
text: i 'm currently stood on the closed northbound a12 at howe green , where engineers are resurfacing part of the road .
the road has been closed since 07:30 this morning after a lorry caught fire .
the carriageway is not likely to reopen until the early hours of the morning .
author: Thomas Magill
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : congestion building in and around chelmsford
text: as we head into rush hour , there are delays in and around chelmsford because of the a12 northbound closure at howe green .
congestion on the a12 is currently back to j15 , for the three mile hill .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: essex men arrested in 'sexting ' investigation
text: two men from essex have been arrested following an investigation into young girls being coerced into sharing nude images of themselves .
hertfordshire police says a `` small number '' of girls in welwyn garden city were pressured into sending explicit and then threatened if more were n't sent .

a man , 18 , from clacton and another man , 19 , from colchester were arrested on sus of making , possessing and distributing indecent images of children and inciting children to engage in sexual activity .
they have been released on police bail until may .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex 's 'number one dog-catcher ' strikes again
text: regular viewers may remember pc joe self ( who is becoming notorious in essex for reuniting lost dogs with their owners .
the essex police officer came on to our radar when he rescued monty , the cancer detecting dog who was stolen in buckhurst hill in august .
now pc self has managed to return his ninth lost pooch , a rottweilier who was found running on cowdray avenue in colchester .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: squash player announces retirement
text: hutton squash player peter barker has announced he is to retire from the sport .
barker , who has been troubled by a persistent knee injury of late , will quit after next week 's hong kong open .
the 32-year-old reached number five in the world and won three commonwealth games medals .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: appeal for cctv after colchester pensioner stabbing
text: essex police is renewing its appeal after a pensioner was stabbed in the garden of his home in colchester .
john sales , 70 , remains in hospital after the attack on hythe hill on 10 november .
stuart pain , 40 , of sydney street , brightlingsea has been charged with attempted murder .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hundreds still without power on canvey
text: uk power networks has told me thousands of people on canvey were without electricity this lunchtime .
the provider said 3,121 customers had an interruption to their supply at around 12:45 today .
about 500 properties are still without power .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: exhausted bat found clinging to a charity shop wall 'flew from europe '
text: an exhausted bat found clinging to a charity shop wall in clacton might have flown all the way across the north sea before ending up in essex .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: travel : southbound a12 reopens at howe green
text: the southbound a12 has reopened at j17 for howe green , following a lorry fire at about 07:30 this morning .
the northbound carriageway remains closed , and is likely to remain shut until at least the early hours of tomorrow .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: four weeks on since gordon wilson went missing , police renew appeal
text: essex police says it 's still trying to trace two motorcyclists who went to the aid of a man believed to be missing grandfather gordon wilson .
it has now been four weeks since the 82-year-old , who has dementia , went missing from his home in leaden roding .
the force says it 's believed mr wilson may have travelled to sible hedingham , where he was helped by two motorcyclists and a pedestrian after falling over .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a12 burnt lorry loaded on to low-loader
text: the a12 clean-up is continuing this afternoon , aftera lorry carrying timbercaught fire near howe green .

documents.title: rolling road block to reopen southbound a12
text: rolling road block going in on # a12 from j19 to j17 with @ twitterid to open up the southbound carriageway .

documents.title: towie star faces fourth trial in celebrity jungle
text: the only way is essex 's ferne mccann found herself in floods of tears as she took part in the latest gruelling trial on i 'm a celebrity get me out of here !
the 25-year-old had to face toads , eels , snakes and crocodiles as she swam through a series of underwater chambers in the floods of fear challenge on the itv reality show .
mccann was successful in the trial , as she returned to camp with 10 stars , which amounts to meals for her fellow campers .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ali carter faces uk championship first-round challenge
text: chelmsford snooker player ali carter plays his first-round match at the uk championship in york this afternoon .
carter is up against alfie burden at 14:00 .
yesterday , southend 's sydney wilson won his first-round contest , but basildon pair allan taylor and zak surety both lost .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: weather : bright afternoon with the chance of showers
text: there will be some bright spells this afternoon with perhaps a few showers in the east .
winds will be gusty .
maximum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: a12 closure : northbound carriageway closed 'until at least 01:00 '
text: essex police says the northbound a12 at junction 17 , howe green , will remain closed `` until at least 01:00 tomorrow '' .
the carriageway is currently shut in both directions following a lorry fire this morning .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : a12 remains closed and justin bieber inspires southend midfielder
text: it has been a busy morning here on the essex news desk , here are your top stories :
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: a12 lorry now clear of timber , road remains closed
text: # a12 lorry now cleared of its load of timber .
recovery underway .
this will take some time due to the severe damage .

documents.title: southend 'executed their game plan ' in oldham thriller
text: southend united manager phil brown says they `` executed their game plan '' as they recorded one of their finest results of the season so far .
the blues romped to a 5-2 win at oldham and are now just one point from the play-off places .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: a12 lorry boss thanks emergency services after vehicle 'explodes '
text: the boss of a maldon-based transport firm which owns the lorry that 'exploded ' on the a12 earlier this morning has thanked the `` quick responses '' of the emergency services .
a driver has been taken to broomfield hospital with a suspected broken arm after the vehicle set alight , closing the carriageway in both directions at howe green .
alan ostridge , of aj ostridge transport , said : `` i can replace the vehicle and timber , but you ca n't replace people , so i 'm thankful really . ''
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: which south essex mps want to bomb syria ?
text: three south essex mps will vote for air strikes to loosen islamic state 's grip on syria .
author: Basildon Echo

documents.title: colchester united supporters 'seemed quite happy ' to see team lose
text: the colchester united manager tony humes was on edge after his side fell to another defeat last night .
the u 's led league one 's bottom club crewe 2-0 , only to lose 2-3 .
in his interview with bbc essex sport , humes appeared to lay part of the blame on the club 's supporters who `` seemed quite happy for them to fail '' .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: tributes paid to 'larger than life ' grandfather who died in motorbike crash
text: the family of a 48-year-old motorcyclist who died in a shoeburyness crash say he was a `` larger than life character , who fought hard for social justice '' .
dominique burrows died when his motorbike hit a car on ness road , on 11 november .
the grandfather 's family said mr burrows was `` well known '' and would be `` sorely missed '' .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: northbound a12 could remain closed overnight
text: the officer dealing with the lorry fire on the a12 at howe green says the road could remain closed overnight :
discussing # a12 closure with @ twitterid northbound will remain closed at j17 throughout the day and maybe overnight for repairs .
@ twitterid @ twitterid that 's handy , part of a12 will be smooth and not filled with intarmac # worstroadinuk

documents.title: daughters write letter to missing gordon wilson
text: the daughters of an 82-year-old man who has been missing for a month have written an open letter to their dad .
gordon wilson , from leaden roding , has vascular dementia .
his daughters , gillian and lesley , wrote : `` we are all beside ourselves with worry .
we love you , please come home . ''

documents.title: a12 remains closed in both directions
text: the a12 is still closed in both directions because of the lorry fire which happened at around 07:30 .
we 'll continue to bring you the latest updates from the scene as we get them , but we 'll also now take a look at some of the other stories happening in essex .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: justin bieber inspires southend midfielder to score
text: it 's maybe not the usual superstition a footballer would have , but southend 's ryan leonard reckons his recent goal rush is down to pop star justin bieber .
the 23-year-old midfielder says the shrimpers listen to the canadian 's music in the dressing room before kick-off .
`` i 'm not sure it 's everyone 's cup of tea , especially adam barrett '' , he said .
author: Phil Shepka
BBC Sport

documents.title: a12 closure : lorry cab completely destroyed
text: this is the cab of the lorry which was alight on the a12 at howe green .
somehow the driver managed to escape with just a broken arm , according to police .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: strong smell of diesel on closed a12
text: it 's believed the lorry struck and mounted this temporary crash barrier , rupturing its diesel tank .
i can smell spilled fuel .
there 's a lot of clearing up to do .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: unloading of smoldering lorry wood begins
text: firefighters have started to unload smoldering wood from the lorry which `` exploded '' on the northbound a12 at about 07:30 .

documents.title: delivery driver stuck on a130 for two hours
text: a delivery driver trying to get to witham has told bbc essex the closure of the a12 is having a `` horrendous '' impact on the a130 .
mandy said it took two hours to travel the 10 miles between battlesbridge and howe green .
`` where lorries are being diverted off the closed a12 , it 's just causing chaos , '' she said .
`` there 's no organisation whatsoever . ''
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a12 closure : lorry driver sustains 'broken arm '
text: sgt colin shead has told me that when he arrived at the scene of the lorry fire on the a12 this morning the vehicle was `` fully ablaze and the cab was completely destroyed '' .
he went on to say : `` the only injury we believe the driver sustained was a broken arm . ''
the driver has been taken to broomfield hospital .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: a12 northbound closed 'for at least four hours '
text: sgt colin shead , who is dealing with the lorry fire on the a12 , has told me the northbound carriageway at howe green will be closed `` for at least four hours '' .
the road is still closed in both directions .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: a12 closure : chelmsford roads struggle under weight of traffic
text: i was stuck on the southbound a12 just before 08:00 , not far from junction 19 for boreham .
queues were building up far behind me , and after i left the dual carriageway i spent 30 minutes queuing to get into chelmsford .
the city 's roads are struggling under the weight of traffic being diverted away from the a12 .
walking or staying at home seems like the more sensible option today !
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: a12 lorry fire looks like the aftermath of a bonfire
text: i 've arrived at the scene of the lorry fire which has closed the a12 in both directions at howe green .
the heavy goods vehicle is full of long pieces of wood , and as you can see it looks like the aftermath of a bonfire .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: round up of roads affected by a12 closure
text: the a12 closure at howe green is having a knock-on affect on surrounding roads :
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : clear but chilly morning
text: clear skies will bring a chilly morning for some , with a touch of ground frost .
these clear spells will persist into the afternoon , giving a bright and sunny day for most .
maximum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: a12 closure : smoke can be seen from a130
text: essex presenter peter holmes is travelling to chelmsford on the a130 , which connects with the a12 at howe green .
he said smoke from the lorry on fire could be seen `` a third of a mile away '' , and that the a130 had come to a standstill .
latest travel for essexcan be found here .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: in other news : greater anglia trains return to a normal service and plea for missing gordon wilson to return home
text: away from the a12 lorry fire , here are your top stories for essex this morning :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: 'a12 will be closed for some time '
text: # a12 will be closed for some time .
@ twitterid hi sgt shead , could you we use your two videos please with a credit to you ?
dave

@ twitterid thank you

text: # a12 lorry laden with wood remains on fire .
# a12 at howe green will remain closed for some time .

thanks nick

please may we use it , with appropriate credit of course ?

documents.title: a12 closure : hgv loaded with wood 'hit barrier '
text: police have told us the driver of a lorry which `` exploded '' on the a12 `` hit the barrier and ruptured a fuel line '' .
it 's thought the heavy goods vehicle was transporting wood .
the driver has been taken to broomfield hospital with minor injuries .

documents.title: a12 lorry was a 'massive explosion '
text: bob from braintree had told bbc essex he witnessed the moment a lorry `` exploded '' on the a12 near howe green .
all of a sudden there was a massive explosion , with a big flash of light , and a couple of explosions after that i thought maybe a plane had come down . ''

documents.title: a12 closure : lorry was '100 % alight '
text: essex fire and rescue says a lorry on fire on the a12 near howe green was `` 100 % alight '' .
the service added : `` firefighters wearing breathing apparatus are using three hose reels to tackle the fire . ''
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: reporter travelling to a12 closure
text: i 'm on my way to find out more information about the closure of the a12 in both directions near howe green .
the closure is likely to cause chaos for thousands of motorists in and around the area this morning .
we 'll bring you more information as we get it .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: a12 closure : police not sure when it will reopen
text: essex police has told us it is currently at the scene of a lorry fire atj17 of the a12 , which has closed the road in both directions .
the force says it was called to the incident just before 07:30 this morning .
it 's not yet known when the road will reopen .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: fire service on site as lorry fire shuts a12
text: # a12 closed at j17 in both directions due to rtc .
diversions in place under j17 .
@ twitterid hi colin , could we use this photo with a credit to you please ?

@ twitterid yes yes .
@ twitterid thank you !

documents.title: travel : a12 closed in both directions at howe green
text: the a12 is closed in both directions due to a lorry fire at j17 for the baddow bypass .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: welcome to wednesday 's live page for essex
text: good morning , and welcome to wednesday 's local live page .
until 18:00 we 'll bring you all the latest news , sport , travel and weather for essex .
if you 'd like to get in touch email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
